song.title: Psalm 19
song.lyrics:
[V] . C C/B May the words of my mouth . Am And the meditations of my heart . F Gsus G Be pleasing to You, pleasing to You . C C/B May the words of my mouth . Am And the meditations of my heart . F Gsus C Be pleasing to You, my God
[C] . F G C C/E You're my rock and my redeemer . F Gsus C C2 You're the reason that I sing . F Gsus Am Dm I desire to be a blessing . G Gsus G In Your eyes . F Gsus C C2 Every hour and every moment . F Gsus C C2 Lord I want to be Your servant . F Gsus Am Dm I desire to be a blessing . G G C In Your eyes, in Your eyes
